WorkItem.Description:
Hey Team,
How could we achieve printing PDF, txt, doc files on network printer in a corporate network where printers have fixed IP address assigned to it.
 
And are we able to use IPP internet printing protocol in dotnet framework 4 to print on any printing sevrer on the Internet. 
 
Thank you
WorkItem.Summary: Managed Code For Network Printing in windows Service or Form in .Net Framework 4 C#
